text:
Message 1929 of 4024
I’m clearly asking to employee the SAAS model. That requires nothing more than what you did when SAAS went up in flames. This is no different.
If you want to make the case it is, and you are forced to burn our community property, that is your choice. We will leave it up to a mediator to sort
through the differences in the SAAS vs Parenting Plan styles.
I am only documenting my interest in saving the money by working together again and your decision. Please let me know. I’d love to work with you.
Sent:03/07/2024 at 09:40 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: You Burn Our Money
Message 1930 of 4024
Thanks for making the time.
Yesterday I asked for an opportunity for us to have a meeting of the minds and really talk about how we can stop this daily slide into hate and
destruction. But now we have urgent issues as well—Andy, RO, and the Parenting Plan.
So are we going to work on what happens in the Emergency Room, or are we going to discuss if we need to start wearing a seat belt? I'd prefer that we
put on the seat belt, but we have patients bleeding out in the emergency room.
I hope you will thoughtfully consider the ongoing impact of saying you are "just not ready" to put on the seatbelt. We have created a prison of our
own making and are paying the price. Hint: adding more locks and layers won't help.
Sent:03/07/2024 at 10:04 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Running List for 10:30
Message 1931 of 4024
.
Sent:03/07/2024 at 10:31 AM

Subject:I’m on
Message 1932 of 4024
Are we talking? It’s 10:35...
